contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 9, 1899 D Halifax Contest
Halifax Contest 5 Other Halifax Contest halifax-contest
Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
Halifax, West Yorkshire 1st prize £10. 2nd prize £7. 3rd prize £4. 4th prize £2. 5th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Haslingden Temperance, 2nd (10s.) Sowerby Bridge. Best Soprano (Henry Tattersall) Haslingden Borough won a Silver Albert. 9 bands competed.
April 19, 2012, 4:17 p.m. July 28, 2019, 4:25 p.m.
1 Sowerby Bridge Subscription Angus Holden
2 Haslingden Borough Band Christopher Smith
3 Hebden Bridge Band Angus Holden
4 Norland Ernest Beaumont
5 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift
Unknown Result Bradford City Unknown
Unknown Result Copley and Skircoat Unknown
Unknown Result Dewsbury Temperance Unknown
Unknown Result Ovenden Unknown
